name: Flask-Dance with Fitbit
description: Testing Flask-Dance's OAuth integration with Fitbit

OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE.description: Indicates that it's OK for Google to return different OAuth scopes than requested.

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

FITBIT_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by Fitbit

FITBIT_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by Fitbit
